dcterms:creator: M. Zampieri
S. Malmasi
P. Nakov
S. Rosenthal
N. Farra
R. Kumar
dcterms:description: This dataset was presented for a shared task on offensive language detection in the SemEval Challenge 2019. It contains 14,000 English tweets annotated for three subtasks: whether a tweet is offensive, whether the offensive tweet is targeted, and the type of target.
dcterms:title: Offensive Language Identification Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Davidson
D. Warmsley
M. Macy
I. Weber
dcterms:description: This dataset annotates tweets into three classes: hate speech, offensive language, and none. It was curated to address the separation of hate speech from other instances of offensive language.
dcterms:title: Hate Speech and Offensive Language Dataset
